name: San Jose Adult Education
description: Free adult education including ESL, GED, and career training in San Jose
fullDescription: San Jose Unified School District Adult Education provides free classes for adults including ESL, GED, citizenship, and career training.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free ESL classes at all levels
- GED and high school diploma preparation
- Citizenship preparation
- Career and technical education
- Digital literacy classes
- Parent education
howToGetIt:
1. Visit San Jose Adult Education center
2. Complete registration
3. Take placement assessment
4. Enroll in appropriate classes
keywords: adult school, San Jose, Santa Clara, GED, ESL, high school diploma, adult education, career training, free classes
